Subject: Dada Saheb Phalke Award
data: 1 Dada Saheb Phalke Award is given by Government of India for the outstanding contribution in the field of : A Literature B Cinema C Sports D Politics Answer: Option [B]
2 Who was the first recipient of Dada Saheb Phalke Award ? A Pankaj Mullick B Prithviraj Kapoor C Devika Rani D Satyajit Ray Answer: Option [C]
3 Who has been awarded with Dada Saheb Phalke Awards for the year 2014 ? A Amitabh Bachchan B Shashi Kapoor C Gulzar D Rekha Answer: Option [B]
4 In which year Dada Saheb Phalke Award presented for the first time ? A 1965 B 1967 C 1969 D 1970 Answer: Option [C]
5 Which of the following is not a recipient of Dada Saheb Phalke Award ? A Prithvi Raj Kapoor B Mrs. Kanan Devi C Gemini Ganesan D Durga Khote Answer: Option [C]
